title: Google | L4 | Bangalore
content:
Education: MTech in Computer Science from Tier 1
Years of Experience: ~4
Prior Experience: SSE at a product based company
Previous TC: 40 LPA
Date of the Offer: May 2024
Company: Google
Title/Level: L4
Salary: 37.6 LPA
Signing Bonus: 6 L
Stock bonus: $90K stock grant vested over 4 years (38%, 32%, 20%, 10%)
Bonus: Performance-based bonus up to 15% of salary every year
Relocation Bonus : TBD with relocation team

Accepted the offer.

Can anyone share the relocation bonus amount for L4 who has joined recently ? Also, do they ask for some kind of proofs regarding relocation (flight tickets etc. ) ?
